You somehow obtained the notebook of a brilliant but eccentric member of your class. The knowledge held within those notes should help you unlock powerful new abilitiesâ€”if you can ever figure out what the notes mean.

Benefit and Drawback: As a respite activity, you can study the notebook. Make a test using your highest characteristic score:

!

You summon a hostile demon of your level or lower who attacks you at the end of the respite. The demon acts first in the combat, regardless of the traits or abilities of you or anyother creature involved.

@

You learn nothing and your time is wasted.

#

You learn one bonus heroic ability from your class that you qualify for. You can use that ability until you finish your next respite.
